oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ready for parade
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: downtown; Main Street; theaters; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clearing S. Main St. for a parade in front of Loew's State Theatre at 152 S. Main which opened in 1920. The Bijou Theatre is on the left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo, 4 in. x 3 in.
